# Overview {-}

This reference guide describes standard operating procedures (SOP) for emLab projects. This schema outlines the major platforms used for all emLab projects:

*insert image of the platforms*

This SOP is organized into 4 different sections: (1) Project Management, (2) Files, (3) Code, and (4) High Performance Computing. Section 1 provides an overview of the platforms we use and how to install them, Section 2 covers file structure and storage, Section 3 highlights best practices for coding, and Section 4 covers high performance computing.
